Posts.EditableText: i want to disable reviews until my game ceases to be a WIP. Can i do that?
Posts.HTML: i want to disable reviews until my game ceases to be a WIP. Can i do that?

Posts.EditableText: Almost. When you unload it, keep it as unlisted. When it ceases to be a work in progress, you can change it to be listed.
Posts.HTML: Almost. When you unload it, keep it as unlisted. When it ceases to be a work in progress, you can change it to be listed.
